# Introduction

I was browsing in stackoverflow today and came across a question about factors.
Well factors were only one part of the question but it got me thinking about the
whole concept of factors in R. So I thought I would take a look at the
beginnings and some of the back and forth over time regarding the pros and cons
of this data construct.
